sect1.title: Pax-&pax-version;

sect2.title: Installation of Pax
sect2.para: This package has somewhat unusual installation instructions, because pax is part of a larger set of utilities included in the same tarball. Issue the following commands:

screen.userinput:
sed -i build/mk.config \ -e '/LIBZ/s@ -Wl[^ ]*@@g' \ -e '/LIBBZ2/{s@^#@@;s@ -Wl[^ ]*@@g}' \ -e '/BZLIB/s@0@1@' &&
make makefiles && make -C libcommon && make -C libuxre && make -C cpio

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed ...: This changes the configuration file build/mk.config so that the system zlib and libbz2 are used and linked as shared libraries.
make makefiles: This command builds all the makefiles.
make -C lib...: First builds the necessary libraries.
make -C cpio: Then builds the archive utilities.

listitem.para: copies files to and from archives in several formats.
